description: 18.10.9.1.11 (BL) Ensure 'Configure use of passwords for fixed data drives' is set to 'Disabled'
info: "This policy setting specifies whether a password is required to unlock BitLocker-protected fixed data drives.
Note: This Group Policy path is provided by the Group Policy template VolumeEncryption.admx/adml that is included with the Microsoft Windows 7 & Server 2008 R2 Administrative Templates (or newer).
solution:
"To establish the recommended configuration via GP, set the following UI path to Disabled :

Computer Configuration\Policies\Administrative Templates\Windows Components\BitLocker Drive Encryption\Fixed Data Drives\Configure use of passwords for fixed data drives
Impact: The password option will not be available when configuring BitLocker for fixed drives."
